intro.p: Declares that for the specified class or method, the given resource file should be loaded and set available in the PropertyBag with the specified name.

section.title: ResourceAttribute(System.String name, System.String resourceName)
section.p: Constructs a resource attribute, with the specified name, based on the resource in a satellite assembly.
